info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.http_response_sender

Class HttpResponseSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.http_response_sender.HttpResponseSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IResponseSender

    public class HttpResponseSender
extends Object
implements IResponseSender
    Response sender object for received HTTP request. It sends a response to the request and closes the connection.
